param.name: access_policy_id
param.doc: The system-assigned access policy ID value.

method.name: DELETE
method.doc: To delete an access policy, issue an HTTP DELETE command on the access policies resource URI.
Note: For the change to take effect, it must be deployed as described in the Configuration changes commit process.

request.doc: To determine the access_policy_id value of the access policy to be deleted, issue an HTTP GET command on the access policys resource URI: https://{appliance_hostname}/iam/access/v8/access-policies.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service.

response.doc: No content returned. The request was successful.
Bad Request. There is a problem with the request. The JSON result describes the problem.
Not Found. The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
Conflict. The JSON result indicates the problem.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
